name: What About Hedgehogs?
description:
What about hedgehogs? This is a game where you will experience the world as a hedgehog. Forage around for food, explore your habitat, smell some plants. But be careful there is always danger around. 

  • Explore the world at your own pace. Life as a hedgehog needs no rush. 
  • All objects in the game are based on real plants and animals. Can you find them all? 
  • See how it feels to be a small hedgehog.

While you explore enjoy the original soundtrack by Daan (combokarel)!
